ctx: intros n p k H f x y H0.
exceptions.tactic: apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 with (f:=fun z => partial_derive p k f z y) (x:=x).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, p, k : nat H : (p + k < n)%nat f : R -> R -> R x, y : R H0 : ex_diff_n f n x y The term "fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z y" has type "R -> R" while it is expected to have type "R -> R -> R" (cannot unify "R" and "R -> R").

ctx: intros n p k H f x y H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment r : nat -> nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R H1 : forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z y) x n, p, k : nat H : (p + k < n)%nat f : R -> R -> R x, y : R H0 : ex_diff_n f n x y Unable to unify "ex_diff_n f n x y" with "ex_derive (fun z : R => r p k f x z) y".

original: intros n p k H f x y H0. apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 with (f:=fun z => partial_derive p k f z y) (x:=x). apply H0.
